metadata.title: CVE-2021-3997 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: [Uncontrolled recursion in systemd-tmpfiles when removing files]

notes.note: amurray> According to the vulnerability report, this is impossible to trigger on systemd versions before commit e535840 which was only in v242 and onwards hence this is not possible to trigger on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS and earlier.

criterions.comment: systemd package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
